Package gui.controllers

Class ServerPortController

java.lang.Object
gui.controllers.ServerPortController
public class ServerPortController extends Object
Controller for managing server port configurations and server status in the GUI. Handles user interactions for starting, stopping, and managing server connections.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      void initialize()

    • onConnectServerClicked

      private void onConnectServerClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event when the connect button is clicked. Starts the server using the provided configuration details.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event

    • importCustomerSimulation

      public void importCustomerSimulation()
      Simulates importing customer data and hides the import button upon completion. This method calls a static method `importCustomerSimulation` from the `Server` class to perform the customer import operation. If a `SQLException` is thrown during the operation, it is caught and its stack trace is printed. After the import process is complete, the import button is set to be invisible.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs during the import operation. (This is caught internally and does not propagate.)

    • addConnectedClient

      public void addConnectedClient(String clientInfo)

    • removeConnectedClient

      public void removeConnectedClient(String clientInfo)

    • updateServerStatus

      private void updateServerStatus(String message)

    • getExitBtn

      private void getExitBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles the action event when the exit button is clicked. Stops the server and exits the application.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while stopping the server or exiting

    • onDisconnectClicked

      private void onDisconnectClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event when the disconnect button is clicked. Stops the server and clears the list of connected clients.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage) throws Exception
      Initializes and displays the Server Port GUI.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the primary stage for the GUI
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while loading the FXML or CSS files
